ygData.subject: Back from the deleated.
ygData.msgSnippet: Piston was furious and all the other spirits knew it. Lunarpine could also sense it. Do you have any idea what you re doing? there is no more Lunarpine no

 Piston was furious and all the other spirits knew it. Lunarpine 
could also sense it.

"Do you have any idea what you're doing? there is no more Lunarpine 
no more Piston, no more Shadow Wing, there is only matrix." Something 
didn't seem right, he'd heard other bots speak of the Matrix, it 
would never force itself upon another bot. "I know now" Lunarpine 
exclaimed, "where I am." this isn't the matrix, "this is crossways. 
where a bot is deemed worthy." Let me speak with my judges." 

Piston looked quizically at Lunarpine. "You can't change your fate."

A loud booming voice interupted Piston. "You know that's not true 
Piston." the voice made the other spirits back up. Lunarpine didn't 
budge. "Why do you wish to change your fate warrior?" The voice 
asked. Lunarpine knew the voice already had the answer, it wanted 
Lunarpine to defend it with his words.

"I'm a warrior of pride, so far every battle I've been involved in 
someones been hurt by my lack of action. " He took a second to gather 
the rest of his courage, "I made a Promise to Shadow Wing, A promise 
that means more to me than my own spark."  the voice contemplated 
Lunarpines words. "Shadow Wings sark hasn't come to us yet, We give 
you permission to care for it until we decide you are no longer 
worthy."

Piston seemed upset by the voices decision. "You will not respond" 
the voice dictated to the young bot.

"You have been offered another chance Lunarpine. The strength of your 
spark has earned you that, make the best of it."

Lunarpine somehow sensed that by getting this chance Lunarpine 
wouldn't need adjustment the next time he crossed this path, next 
time he'd be ready.

every

you
